snippet.title: Lysward - Official Teaser Reveal | Wishlist Now On Steam
snippet.description:
Wishlist Lysward on Steam now: 

Lysward is a single-player survival adventure game set in a vast and unforgiving desert in the fantastical world of Umbra. Explore, craft, team up with your companion, and leverage the Amri magic to endure the heat.

Join our Discord:
https://discord.gg/snowcastlegames

#survivalgames #adventuregames #gametrailers #gaming #gamingvideos #gamedev #indiedev #indiegame #videogames #steam #pc #pcgaming #pcgamer #pcgames
